author: cnbc.com
title: Reading International: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
CULVER CITY, Calif. (AP) _ Reading International Inc. (RDI) on Thursday reported first-quarter net income of $3 million.
The Culver City, California-based company said it had net income of 13 cents per share.
The movie theater owner posted revenue of $75.8 million in the period.
Reading International shares have declined 7.5 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has decreased 1 percent in the last 12 months.
